items.name: Caffe Latte
items.description: Rich, full-bodied espresso in steamed milk, lightly topped with foam. A caffè latte is simply a shot or two of bold, tasty espresso with fresh, sweet steamed milk over it.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a deep layer of foam.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: Espresso combined with vanilla-flavoured syrup, milk and caramel sauce over ice.

items.name: Caffè Americano
items.description: HOT: Rich, full-bodied espresso with hot water.

items.name: Almond Croissant
items.description: Rich, almond flan enveloped in a croissant, then topped with sliced almonds. It's the perfect combination of sweet and savory.

items.name: 7 Seeds Cookie
items.description: Not your ordinary 7 Type Seeds mix in with a Peanut Butter Batter

items.name: Double Chocolate Cream Frappuccino
items.description: Rich mocha-flavored sauce meets up with chocolaty chips, milk and ice for a blender bash. Top it off with sweetened whipped cream and mocha drizzle for a real party in your mouth.
